programme.desc: Opinions regarding the day's top sports stories.

programme.title: Live: The Point
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship hockey show featuring highlights, news, analysis, speed, skill and access to the biggest stars, stories and personalities of the game. Hosted by John Buccigross.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: From Kelly/Shorts Stadium in Mount Pleasant, Mich.

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter, who offer the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.Guests: Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Ryan Clark, Mina Kimes, Field Yates, Adam Schefter, Keyshawn Johnson..

programme.title: Jingle Bell Run
programme.desc: Self-described bookworm Avery is paired with retired hockey star Wes to compete in a holiday race across America. The team struggles through themed challenges until romance runs its course.

programme.title: Confessions of a Christmas Letter
programme.desc: After years of losing her community's Christmas letter competition, Settie Rose hires Juan, a struggling novelist, to depict her dysfunctional family in the best possible light.

programme.title: Write Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jessica sends Christmas cards to five people who have greatly impacted her life.

programme.title: Write Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jessica sends Christmas cards to five people who have greatly impacted her life.

programme.title: The Nine Lives of Christmas
programme.desc: As the Christmas holiday draws near, a veterinary student (Kimberly Sustad) and a stray cat challenge a fireman's (Brandon Routh) commitment to life as a bachelor.

programme.title: Haul Out the Holly: Lit Up
programme.desc: Emily and Jared are looking forward to celebrating the holidays together again, this time as a couple. They're also ready to work with members of the community to make this year's Christmas festivities the best yet.

programme.title: Where Are You, Christmas?
programme.desc: Addy wishes for a year without Christmas and wakes up in a black-and-white world. She must work together with the town mechanic to restore the holiday to all its glory.

programme.title: Never Been Chris'd
programme.desc: Home for the holidays, BFFs Naomi and Liz reconnect with high school crush Chris Silver. A complex love triangle forms, forcing them to take stock of their lives and find the value of friendship.

programme.title: Christmas With the Darlings
programme.desc: When an assistant gives her final notice, she is drawn into helping the younger brother of her boss as he looks after his orphaned nieces and nephew through Christmas.

programme.title: 12 Gifts of Christmas
programme.desc: Anna is hired to become a personal Christmas shopper for Marc. As they work together, Anna helps Marc learn that Christmas giving should be about the importance of the gift, and Anna discovers she might find success as an artist in an unexpected way.

programme.title: One Royal Holiday
programme.desc: When Anna offers a stranded mother and son shelter from a blizzard, she learns that they are the royal family of Galwick and that they are both in need of a little Christmas magic.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Letters to Santa
programme.desc: Lisa's trip home to Evergreen for the holidays finds her shepherding an effort to save the town's beloved general store, fulfilling the wishes of a Christmas past and finding a romance full of Christmas magic.

programme.title: A Royal Queens Christmas
programme.desc: A prince makes his way to Queens, N.Y., when a local woman enlists his help for a children's Christmas show.

programme.title: Confessions of a Christmas Letter
programme.desc: After years of losing her community's Christmas letter competition, Settie Rose hires Juan, a struggling novelist, to depict her dysfunctional family in the best possible light.

programme.title: My Norwegian Holiday
programme.desc: A grieving woman forges a deep connection with a Norwegian man when he discovers she has a troll figurine from his hometown. She soon agrees to accompany him to Norway to uncover the troll's origins and find her own path to healing, love and family.

programme.title: Holiday Crashers
programme.desc: Best friends Toni and Bri have worked at the same card shop for more years than they should as both struggle to find their true life's path. Toni and Bri decide to create new identities to crash the Christmas parties.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: #Xmas
programme.desc: When interior designer Jen is selected for a social media competition for a design brand, she poses as an influencer with her best friend playing her husband and her nephew as her baby.

programme.title: Round and Round
programme.desc: Rachel's stuck in a time loop, reliving the night of her parents' Hanukkah party. Can Zach, the nice boy grandma's trying to set her up with, help her make it to tomorrow?

programme.title: Navigating Christmas
programme.desc: Recently divorced Melanie and her son Jason visit a remote island for Christmas, only to find themselves running a real working lighthouse where she connects with the curt but cute owner.

programme.title: Christmas on Cherry Lane
programme.desc: Three families celebrate Christmas at turning points in their lives.

programme.title: A Christmas Cookie Catastrophe
programme.desc: Sparks fly between the new CEO of a small-town cookie company and the owner of a local bakery as they try to recreate a stolen secret recipe.

programme.title: A Merry Scottish Christmas
programme.desc: When estranged siblings Lindsay and Brad Morgan travel to Scotland at Christmas to reunite with their mother Jo, a big family secret is revealed.

programme.title: Lights, Camera, Christmas!
programme.desc: A woman signs on to be a costume designer for a movie that's shooting in he hometown. While rediscovering her passion for the craft, she winds up falling for the film's famous leading man.

programme.title: The Christmas Note
programme.desc: Gretchen returns to her hometown and meets her neighbor Melissa. They form a reluctant friendship when Melissa discovers she has a sibling she never knew about, and through their detective work, they uncover a huge surprise.

programme.title: Christmas at the Plaza
programme.desc: When historian Jessica is hired to create the Plaza's Christmas display, she finds more than facts while teaming up with handsome decorator Nick to bring the display to life.

programme.title: Santa Tell Me
programme.desc: A design show host finds a letter from Santa promising to meet her true love, a man named Nick, by Christmas Eve. Meeting three Nicks complicates her search.

programme.title: A Reason for the Season
programme.desc: In order to earn her trust fund and with the help of a handsome local attorney, Evie is tasked with granting Christmas wishes to the people who saved her life on the night of her birth.

programme.title: A Dream of Christmas
programme.desc: An ambitious married woman gets more than she bargained for when her wish to be single again is granted. She awakens to discover she's got everything she's ever wanted, except her husband. She resolves to find him a second time.

programme.title: Time for Him to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Four days before Christmas, Elizabeth Athens receives a voicemail from a number she doesn't recognize. On the message, a man she doesn't know makes one final plea for the love of his life to give him a second chance.

programme.title: The Christmas Promise
programme.desc: Nicole learns to deal with grief, with the help of her grandfather and a carpenter she hires to renovate the home that was once meant for her and her fiancé.

programme.title: A December Bride
programme.desc: Layla accompanies Seth to her cousin's wedding, and everyone is surprised when she announces they're engaged. They are forced to keep up the pretense, and as they spend more time together, they find themselves feeling something very real.

programme.title: Long Lost Christmas
programme.desc: Hayley is an interior designer who plans to surprise her recently widowed mother with the perfect holiday present -- the extended family she knows her mom yearns for.

programme.title: Magical Christmas Ornaments
programme.desc: Marie finds her Christmas spirit reawakened when her mother begins sending her the family's Christmas ornaments. As each ornament arrives, it brings a positive change to Marie's life, including an introduction to the handsome man from next door.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's A Mrs. Miracle Christmas
programme.desc: When members of a family face loneliness and lose faith, Mrs. Miracle swoops in to renew their Christmas spirit.

programme.title: The Christmas Doctor
programme.desc: A doctor encounters a man from her past who brings with him a revelation that could change her life forever.

programme.title: Time for Her to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Carly heads to a quaint town to lead the church choir during Christmastime. As she gets to know an Army veteran and the townspeople, she stumbles across clues that suggest she may have been brought there for a life-changing reason.

programme.title: Christmas Wonderland
programme.desc: Heidi returns home to watch her niece and nephew and comes face to face with her high school love. Heidi offers to help him with a dance, and the more time she spends decorating, the more she finds herself inspired to start painting again.

programme.title: Holly & Ivy
programme.desc: A contractor helps a woman renovate a house so she can adopt a sick neighbor's two children.

programme.title: Time for Them to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: A woman with amnesia catches a ride with her handsome nurse to investigate the only clue to her identity: a newspaper clipping for a Christmas festival with a cryptic invitation.

programme.title: Homegrown Christmas
programme.desc: When forced to work together to organize a Christmas dance for the local high school, former sweethearts find themselves rediscovering what made them fall in love all those years ago.

programme.title: Christmas Tree Lane
programme.desc: When music store owner Meg spearheads community efforts to save her street from demolition, she is shocked to find out that the man she's falling for is working for the company that she is fighting.

programme.title: Ms. Christmas Comes to Town
programme.desc: After receiving a terminal diagnosis, a shopping channel host known as Ms. Christmas embarks on a multi-city excursion to spread holiday cheer before her farewell broadcast.

programme.title: Deliver by Christmas
programme.desc: Bakery owner Molly meets Josh, a newcomer in town, but is also enchanted by a mysterious client whom she's never met in person. A special wish to be delivered by Christmas could help determine who will win Molly's heart.

programme.title: A Christmas to Remember
programme.desc: A TV personality drives to a small-town mountain retreat. On her way, a blizzard veers her off the road and she crashes. When she awakens, she has complete amnesia, and a friendly passerby takes her in.

programme.title: Christmas in the Air
programme.desc: A no-nonsense professional organizer (Catherine Bell) learns that opposites do attract when she begins to fall for her client, a frazzled widower (Eric Close) who spends his time inventing toys.

programme.title: 'Tis the Season for Love
programme.desc: An out-of-work actress (Sarah Lancaster) finds romance after returning to her quaint hometown during Christmastime.

programme.title: Journey Back to Christmas
programme.desc: A nurse (Candace Cameron Bure) from World War II is transported in time to 2016 and meets a man who helps her discover the bonds of family and that the true meaning of Christmas is timeless.

programme.title: Memories of Christmas
programme.desc: When Noelle inherits her mother's house, she finds out that for the past few years her aging mother had been hiring professionals to decorate it for Christmas. Noelle tells the decorator that the deal is off, but he refuses to take no for an answer.

programme.title: Northpole: Open for Christmas
programme.desc: During Christmastime a handyman and an elf persuade a businesswoman to keep the inn that she inherited from her aunt.

programme.title: In Merry Measure
programme.desc: When pop star Darcy returns home to spend Christmas with her sister and niece, she unexpectedly finds herself coaching the high school choir with her onetime rival, Adam.

programme.title: The Christmas Secret
programme.desc: A struggling single mother (Bethany Joy Lenz) searches for a lost family heirloom that she hopes will bring her love and good fortune in time for the holidays.

programme.title: We Need a Little Christmas
programme.desc: Facing her first Christmas as a single mother, Julie develops an unexpected friendship with an older neighbor.

programme.title: Vince Carter: The Interview
programme.desc: Vince Carter, an eight-time NBA All-Star, sits down for an exclusive one-on-one interview and discusses his 2000 Slam Dunk performance, his playing days with the Toronto Raptors, and more.

programme.title: The Doctor
programme.desc: The definitive look at Julius "Dr. J" Erving's life and career--growing up in New York, playing in the ABA, and winning a NBA championship with the Philadelphia 76ers.

programme.title: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: The Griswolds (Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo) spend the holiday in a garish way, especially when a country cousin (Randy Quaid) pulls up in an RV.

programme.title: The Polar Express

programme.title: Fred Claus

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.title: Charmed

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Piper is attacked by demons and winds up in a coma, and as she hovers between life and death, her spirit meets Cole (Julian McMahon), who says he is trying to help restore Phoebe's faith in love.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Zankou uses his underlings to lure the sisters out of their house, so he can search for the Nexus and release the Shadow, the ultimate power.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Pandora's Box falls into the hands of a shape-shifting demon (Michelle Hurd) who intends to open it and release all of its sorrows into the world, sending the sisters on a search for Hope (Brooke Nevin).

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Bobby asks Dean and Sam for help after Crowley refuses to return Bobby's soul; a deep secret about Crowley is revealed.

programme.title: Supernatural

programme.title: Supernatural

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean is suspicious of Samuel's (Mitch Pileggi) motives; a hunting trip goes horribly awry.

programme.title: Charmed

programme.desc: Pratite biciklističku trku Saitama Criterium, koja se održava 6. novembra 2022. godine u Saitami u Japanu. Ovo takmičenje se održava od 2013. godine u organizaciji Saitama Sports Commissiona.

programme.title: Košarka - Nemačka liga: Ulm - Gottingen
programme.desc: Iz godine u godinu, Bundesliga je jača. Zna se da su Alba i Bajern uvek moćni, ali sada imaju i žestoku konkurenciju.

programme.title: Sport & Tech Lifestyle
programme.desc: Emisija Sport & Tech Lifestyle vodi vas kroz svet najnovijih lifestyle i tehnologija u sportu.

programme.title: Profi boks: Davis - Lemos
programme.desc: Roki Marčano, Majk Tajson, Šugar Rej Robinson, Muhamed Ali, Džo Luis. Treba li još koji razlog više da bi pratili ovu plemenitu borilačku veštinu? Prve tragove boksa nalazimo već u trećem veku pre...

programme.title: Fudbal - Liga nacija CONCACAF: Panama - Costa Rica
programme.desc: Karibi imaju nacije koje su u fudbalskom usponu. Ova nova Liga Nacija koju je napravio Konkakaf sigurno će im pomoći da nastave sa usponom. (LIVE).

programme.title: Moto GP Barcelona II: Moto GP: TRKA
programme.desc: Neki od najuspešnijih motociklista sveta okupljaju se u Barseloni, na takmičenju na kom će se boriti da zauzmu što bolji plasman. Iako je prvobitno planirano da se takmičenje održi u Valensiji, trka...

programme.title: Košarka - Španska liga: Barcelona - Valencia
programme.desc: Španska košarkaška ACB liga osnovana je 1957. godine kao "Liga National". U ligi sudeluje 18 ekipa prema dvokružnom sistemu takmičenja.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: Trenuci koji će zauvek ostati upisani u istoriji sporta. Koševi, golovi i dostignuća koja su uvek neiscrpna tema među ljubiteljima sporta...

programme.title: Koledž košarka: NC State - Colgate
programme.desc: NCAA je najpoznatiji košarkaški turnir univerziteta na svetu! Obavezno i ovog proleća pratite ko će biti najbolja univerzitetska ekipa u SAD-u i koje će možda buduće NBA zvezde zablistati.

programme.title: Fudbal - Liga nacija CONCACAF: USA - Jamaica
programme.desc: Karibi imaju nacije koje su u fudbalskom usponu. Ova nova Liga Nacija koju je napravio Konkakaf sigurno će im pomoći da nastave sa usponom.

programme.title: Košarka - Grčka liga: Kolossos - Panathinaikos
programme.desc: Pratite prenose Grčke lige, prestižnog takmičenja čije je prvo izdanje održano u sezoni 1927/1928. Takmičenje svake sezone okuplja 12 klubova, a ubedljivo najuspešnija ekipa od osnivanja lige je...

programme.title: Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za SP (Azija): North Korea - Uzbekistan
programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja. (LIVE).

programme.title: Odbojka - Poljska liga (ž): Kalisz - Bielsko Biala
programme.desc: Uživajte uz utakmice najvišeg ranga ženskog, ligaškog takmičenja u Poljskoj na kom učestvuju najbolji odbojkaški klubovi ove zemlje.

programme.title: Zlatni momenti YU sporta & SK Moments
programme.desc: Zlatni momenti YU sporta & SK Moments.

programme.title: Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za SP (Azija): Oman - Iraq
programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja. (LIVE).

programme.title: SK Mix
programme.desc: Najbolji, najsmešniji, najčudniji, sve što ima veze sa superlativima videćete u ovom specijalnom kolažu. I verujte, neće vam biti dovoljno da ga odgledate samo jednom...

programme.title: Fudbal - Kvalifikacije za SP (Azija): Kuwait - Jordan
programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja. (LIVE).

programme.desc: Bliži se Svetsko prvenstvo i sve je manje prostora za grešku u kvalifikacijama. Mi smo na svim kontinentima i pratimo sva dešavanja.

programme.title: Rukomet - Nemačka liga: Hamburg - Fuchse
programme.desc: Rukometna Bundesliga je najviši rang takmičenja u Nemačkoj. Kvalitetom igre smatra se jednim od najkvalitetnijih rukometnih liga na svetu.

programme.title: E-Sports: CS2 - Shanghai Major 2024
programme.desc: Najbolji Counter-Strike timovi sveta doleću u Šangaj kako bi se borili na drugom ovogodišnjem Major turniru. Da li će NAVI odbraniti titulu ili će G2 otplesati svoj poslednji ples sa dugo očekivanim...

programme.title: Moto GP Barcelona II: Moto 2: TRKA
programme.desc: Pratite napeto takmičenje najboljih motociklista sveta. Nakon katastrofalnih poplava koje su pogodile istok Španije, odlučeno je da se trka premesti iz Valensije u Barselonu.

programme.title: Moto GP Barcelona II: Moto 3: TRKA
programme.desc: Spremite se za dozu adrenalina i pratite uzbudljive trke nekih od najboljih motociklista sveta! Nakon velikih poplava koje su jeseni 2024. godine pogodile istok Španije, odlučeno je da se trka iz...

programme.title: Uži izbor

programme.desc: Najjače klupsko takmičenje u košarci na području Evrope svake sezone privlači pažnju velikog broja zaljubljenika košarku. Kao takmičenje visokog kvaliteta verujemo da će privući vašu pažnju.

programme.title: Odbojka - Poljska liga: Czestochowa - Olsztyn
